model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Speaker B, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Speaker A: The portrait you ordered is coming along swimmingly! How are the little furries doing?
Speaker B: They are doing well. I think I am going to paint a portrait of my great dane standing next to my pet rat lol. Do you know where you want to get your new cat from?
Speaker A: Someone I work with at the dog daycare works at a shelter.  I think I will go there.
Speaker B: That's great. I have gotten my pets from the shelter and they seem happy I brought them home. I have a hard time saying no to them which is why I have so many pets. Cats are easier to take care of than dogs. Do you have a name in mind for your cat? 
Speaker A: I've thought of a lot of  names, but in the end it will probably depend on the breed and the sex.  

[MEMORY]
Speaker B prefers painting regular people over professionals and discovered their love for portraits through a self-portrait with pets. Speaker B thinks pit bulls are lovely and has one that is kind and sweet. Speaker B likes Persian cats and imagines their pets having interesting interactions.

Speaker B has 5 dogs of different breeds and has rats as pets but didn't include them in the portrait. Speaker B thinks pit bulls are lovely and has one that is kind and sweet. Speaker A is considering getting kittens and thinks rats can be smart.

Speaker B has 5 dogs of different breeds and has rats as pets but didn't include them in the portrait. Speaker A is interested in getting a dog and likes Akitas. Speaker A prefers adopting pets from shelters rather than from breeders.
